name: Deep Dig Pizza
description:
If you have performance or audio issues try the Windows Build at the bottom of the page

As a young and spry pizza maker, aboard your flying slicer, you take on your Pop-pop's debt -err, I mean, legacy as the owner of Deep Dig Pizza. Navigate through the cavernous depths of the gooey Pizza Planet to mine for ingredients. Manage your time carefully to complete as many order's as possible, Pop-pop's legacy depends on it!

Lovingly assembled over 72 hours for Ludum Dare 48

Controls

  • Movement/Drill - WASD
  • Complete Orders - Left Mouse Button
  • Open Cooking Menu - E

Team

  • @lzklein - Sound Designer, Composer
  • @bordenary - 3D Artist
  • @ZRubyWorks - 3D Artist
  • @JaidenG123 - Engineer
  • @BMMader - Engineer
  • @BrandnGarcia - Producer, VFX

Change Log - 04/29/2021

  • Fixed issue where pizza ingredients would overlap in the UI
  • Fixed issue where inventory would display incorrect number of ingredients at start of level
  • Fixed end total to include debt
